cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("CMP")

list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH
     "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/ThirdParty/FRUT/prefix/FRUT/cmake")
include(Reprojucer)

if(MSVC)
  add_compile_options(/bigobj)
endif()

    "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/cues_media_player.jucer")
